info.name: Insurance Management API
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for Insurance Management System - includes user management, insurance companies, insured customers, accident reports, financial reports, and more.

request.description: Creates a default admin user for the system
Authenticate user and get JWT token
Send password reset code via email
Reset password using code received via email

item.name: User Management

request.description: Get current user profile information
Change current user password
Update user profile information
Add head of employee to a specific department
Remove head of employee from department
Get head of employee for a specific department
Add employee to a specific department
Remove employee from department
Get all employees in a specific department

item.description: User management and employee administration endpoints

request.description: Create a new department
Get all departments in the system
Get specific department by ID
Update department information
Delete a department
Add a new insurance company
Get all insurance companies
Update insurance company information
Delete an insurance company

item.name: Insured Management

request.description: Add a new insured customer with image upload
Get all insured customers
Get specific insured customer by ID
Update insured customer information
Delete an insured customer
Add a vehicle to an insured customer
Get all vehicles for a specific customer
Update vehicle information
Remove a vehicle from customer
Add insurance policy to a vehicle
Get insurance policies for a specific vehicle
Upload multiple files for a customer

item.description: Insured customer and vehicle management endpoints

request.description: Get total count of insured customers
Get insured customers breakdown by month
Get total count of vehicles
Get count of active insurance policies
Get count of expired insurance policies
Get total payments amount
Get payments breakdown by payment method
Get comprehensive customers report
Get vehicle insurance comprehensive report
Report an accident for a specific vehicle
Get all accidents for a specific vehicle

Get total count of accidents
Get comprehensive accident report
Add accident report for Takaful insurance
Get all Takaful accident reports
Add accident report for Trust insurance
Add accident report for Al-Ahlia insurance
Add accident report for Palestine insurance
Add accident report for Al-Mashreq insurance
Add report for Holy Land insurance
Add a new insurance agent
Get all insurance agents
Update agent information
Delete an insurance agent
Get total count of agents

item.name: Financial Management

request.description: Add a new business expense
Calculate and get net profit (revenue - expenses)
Cancel an insurance policy
Get comprehensive company financial report
Transfer insurance from one vehicle to another
Get customer payments report
Get report of transferred insurance policies
Get report of cancelled insurance policies

item.description: Financial management, expense tracking, and revenue reporting
